conbody.p: To create custom error pages, create the following HTML files in /home/<hcf-directory>/static/vendor/errors/ on each router node:
When present, these files can be used to display information about the corresponding HTTP errors.
conbody.note: You can use the default error pages in /home/<hcf-directory>/code/console/errors as a reference. However, you must not modify these files directly because your changes may be lost during a patch or an upgrade.
